content.detailedDescription:
Riding 4 wheeler atv ..Came around bend and there was a ufo to my left at apx 75' high and it was reflecting the sky sort of like the predator movie. it just blinked out. it was a sort of rectangle, after it blinked out i went to top of the mountain and saw a silver object going across the valley at apx 3 miles. i dont know if they were the same object.

i didnt really mention the event for a long time like my brain couldnt belive what i saw.
content.summary: Saw ufo that looked like part of the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just got into my car to drive over to a friend's house.  i started out heading south on davisville rd near street rd in bucks county and almost immediately noticed some really bright red lights in the sky that looked to form a huge triangle.  they were very far apart, but you could tell that the angles were all perfect to form a triangle.  i watched it for a couple of minutes as i continued driving south on davisville, and the lights seemed to be moving, getting a little closer together but still retaining
the triangle shape.  when i turned into the heavily wooded masons mill park area, my view of the lights started to diminish.  on the last good look that i got, i noticed that one of the red lights 'disappeared' and at that point i only saw two lights.  anyway i didn't mention it because i thought i must be crazy and that there's no way it could really be a ufo.  i'm such a ufo geek, there's no way i'd actually spot one.   that's what i thought....And then i started doing some research and realized there have been tons of similar reports from the same area over the last few months.  

i don't have any proof to back up what i saw that night, but whatever has been spotted in the bucks county area over the past few months is still there.  i noticed someone else on here made a claim to have seen this object on nov 18th and was surprised that there were no other reports of it.  well, i didn't catch it on the 18th, but i did see it in the same area only a few nights later.
content.summary: 3 red lights forming a triangle

content.detailedDescription:
While traveling north on lansdown blvd, as we approched easthigh st. we saw a large white light slowly cross the road almost right above our location. i slowed my vehicle to get a better look and reolized that i could no longer see the sky above us. after about 30 seconds two more lights went over us. the lights apeared to be about 200 yards apart, and just did clear the tree tops. what struck me was that whatever this thing was, made no sound what so ever. my wife began to panic because we had our children in the car,and wanter to get home. i asked her if she reolized that if whatever that was could get here it could follow us home? we arrived home without further insodent. 
   i am a retired captain with the mahoning sheriff's department, and did not make a report, because i did not want anyone to think i was crazy.
content.summary: While returning from drive-in movie spotted over the roadway about 40ft above road.

content.detailedDescription: It was a beutiful lightning storm.And out of nowherelightning hit something metal above the trees it started falling in flames and out of nowhere in a blink of an eye it was gone it took of  toward mguiare air force base.I think my friend was with me to. then we thought other people saw it cause we seen flashlights coming our way.Then the flash lights disappeared and we smelt something like hydrulic oil.We werein the woods when this happened fishing at nehaminy creek. this is no b.S and i would like to know if we were not the only ones that seen it. iknow nothing that are gov. hasthat is that fast or quiet. and leave a light trail arcing up lighting does not do that. check when the storm was in june and that  will confirm the date thank you for your time.I called my friend he said i can use his name mark mccue.
content.summary: Lightning hitting metal object and it falls and then takes off in a blink of an eye.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north on ih45 heading towards the woodlands. i saw a streak of light enter from directly in front of me from east to west. it looked like debris that was on fire and breaking up as it came across my view. i could see small parts coming off of the main streak. it seems as though is was breaking apart as it moved closer to the ground. i am an amateur astronomer and have witnessed many meteor showers in the past. this may have been just that but it seemed to be different that what i had seen in the past. i would be interested to know if anyone else saw the same or if it was even reported.
content.summary: Possible meteor.

content.detailedDescription: Light was turned off so we could see the stars better. i had one of those flashlights that uses a large square battery. i pointed it at the light and blinked it three times. to my amazement it blinked back three times. so i did it again with the same results. my wife also saw this. i don't know how much time had passed but when i looked again it was gone. during the whole time of observation, it stayed in the same spot.
content.summary: It appeared as a green light in the distance to the north. about 2 o'clock elevation. it just sat there. my wife,myself and kids were sitting in the driveway looking at the stars as we had just moved from ft. worth to the country. our outside security

content.detailedDescription:
1. on 11-23-2008 at 3:00pm me and my daughter we were sighting seeing and taking photos of everything in downtown orlando.

2. while we were drving through downtown my daughters exact words were "daddy, daddy! look at the formation in the sky." i then said "what formation?" she already had taken a photo of the formation in the sky.

3.Unfortunately for me i did not get to see it and payed it no mind.

4. judging from the photo, it is hard to explain. the anomoly has two different spiral/circular, this is a genaric words can't explain the shape formations and the light sources permeating from the anomoly until you see the photo.

5. none, because i was not able to see it until i checked the photos my daughter had taken.

6. between the time when my daughter told me and i tried to look because i was driving. maybe within 15-20secs.
content.summary: Caught anomaly in the sky on my camera.

content.detailedDescription:
I got off duty from my job as a police detective at about 2300 hrs. and when i was being driven home i saw the object to my right up in the sky. it was a clear night. the object caught my attention because it was bright and hovering but i didn't pay any more attention to it.  i got dropped off at my house about one half mile down the road and when i got out of the car in front of my house i saw the same object across the street from my house hovering between two houses.  i said to my driver who was a lt. "what to hell is that".  we stared at it fro about one minute and he said, "i don't know what it is but don't say anyitng to anyone because they wll think we are nuts". then he left.  i stood there looking at the object for about five minutes and then went and sat on my front porch watchng it fro about another ten minutes.  hard to gauge time because i was scared and fascinated at the same time. the object was quite large, disc shaped and had bright pulsatng lights around it.  the colors were amber, green, red and blue.  they were very bright. i could vaguely make out what appeared to be a dome on top but the lights were so brihgt that i coudn't see clearly but i believe the color of the dome was a dull silver. i had an eerie feeling that the object was focusing on me because no body else was around and it was a sunday night in the suburbs which means no traffic was out. the object was about 75 yards across and was hovering at about 100 feet. it did not move the whole time and there definitely was not any noise. i did not have a camera and even if i did i was too scared to use it. i got up and went inside and woke my wife up and showed her and when we both looked out the front window it wsa still there. my wife asked if we could take a vidieo with the old beta type recoreders but i told her no because i didnt want to have to turn on the light apparatus with the camera because it might scare the object away.  we watched it fro about ten more minutes and it didnt move.  when it did move it sped up and back at a speed i never saw before. then it seemed to just reappear at the new location.  about 5 seconds later it went up higher and forward and stopped fro another 5 seconds then up and out of sight at incredible speeds.  i never heard anyitng from the object as it moved and even today there is nothing that comes close to the speed that it moved.  it moved literally like the blink of an eye.  

i was a seasoned law enforcement officer and detective and i spent a few years in the usmc working around helicopters and jets. this object was not a military aircraft and it moved wiht speed that is not possible from our aircraft.

i never told anyonme about this for many, many years partly because if my lt. found out i was afraid to get him involved and i would be disciplined and parly because i didnt want people to think i was insame.  after your story aired about the sightings in bucks county which is wher my incident happened i feel more comfortablee talking about it. my only regret was that i didnt take a pic but i didnt own  35 mm amd the movie cames was antiquated and i didnt want to take time away from observing the object.  i do know that i was very frightened even though i was armed.  again i had the disitnct feeling that hthe object was studying me.
content.summary: Spotted a disc shaped object wiht multi colored pusaitng lights.  large, made no noise and hocvered an moved about three times at incredible speed.  i was getting off work as polcie detective when i spotted it.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi,
i am a medical professional.
the event happened some time ago in the late 1980's or earlier.
i never really spoke too much about this because it wasn't the typical ufo
space craft story.  that all changed when i saw the television episode
titled  "ufo files black box secrets" in 2006.
the episode describes an "east coast" style ufo from the 80's and 90's the same as i saw, which did really startled when i saw this tv show.
i saw the "black box" episode recently and thought you might like to hear this.

i was driving with a good friend of mine, to this day, up north probably going to new hampshire to ski.  we were on route 684 near brewster ny in the afternoon or earlier when i heard a powerful roar and rumble at my right. i was in the front passenger seat.  i looked out the right side window and saw what appeared to me to be
a cigar missle shaped vehicle maybe some 100 to 200 feet above me shooting
right over us with a mist coming out of its end.  i immediately
turned my head to the driver side window asking my friend if he saw it?
at the same time i'm asking this i can see the vehicle (out through his driver side window) was now many miles away i'm guessing 10 to 20 or more miles shooting straight up through the clouds and into the sky and gone.  my friend said he saw nothing and we drove on. this whole event took about 1 to 2 seconds only.
thank you for taking a look.
p
content.summary: Late 1980's- cigar missle like vehicle with mist  going incredibly fast

content.detailedDescription:
I was at an air balloon race in my first year of college and first month living in reno. i think they call it dawn patrol. anyway, i was with a friend of mine and i was taking photographs of the even with no flash and long/open shutter on my canon rebel xt. i'm a photography student and i prefer my photos to be more "organic" than anything else, so i don't use flash. i was watching the balloons and taking pictures, and every no and then looking back at the photos to see what kind of pictures i was getting. it was about 5am in the morning when the races started. i looked back at some pictures to see this blue line moving across the sky. i understand that with the slow shutter likes move around, but everything else in the photos was still and it was much, much brighter than other stars and objects. i had started just watching with my eyes, not through the camera's viewfinder, and started to see the light moving around. it was not a plane. i noticed that it would move, stop, move, stop, move, stop, erratically. i'm a big believer in ufo's, as is my mom who says she saw one decades ago in new york. i, however, had never seen one. so i decided to open the shutter completely, set the camera on the ground and hold it still so that the camera's movement couldn't be a cause of the light moving in the picture. i caught it in pictures clearly about 3 times. but the blueish quick moving light wasn't the only one i saw. there was also a green bar that seemed to show up randomly in my photos that i saw with my own eyes a few times as well, this one seemed to show up more often in my pictures at home after the balloon races. i'm not positive about the green one and it's validity as some kind of ufo, but it shows up randomly and i've never seen this kind of light show up in my photographs, ever, and i know my camera. at my first sight of the blue one i felt confused and then realized what i thought it was a became excited and had to have more pictures. i was really grateful that it was dark and that i knew, as an experienced photo-taker, that a slower shutter would show its movements, not just a snapshot. eventually the objects randomly disappeared as morning came. it was awesome to see.

i have more pictures for you guys if you want them, i gave the three that are, in my opinion, the best out of the bunch. none of the three are the green one, if you want to see those, i'll send them. they're also all pretty large photos, so hopefully you can zoom in enough to see them.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Fast and erratic moving star-like things

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dog for the evening and gazing up to enjoy the night sky when i noticed a trio of lights hanging in the sky in a perfectly even triangle.  faint light, almost bluish, seemed to come from the sides of the object.

for the few minutes i was outside, the object made no sound or movement, but hung visibly in the sky, below the clouds when they were on occasion blown through.

as i looked at it, i felt only disbelief.  obviously i was seeing something else.  but there were no strobe lights to indicate a standard man-made aircraft, and it hung in the sky, too low to be stars or a a reflection on clouds, and too high to be part of some terrestrial structure.

i went inside to put the dog away and note the time.  when i came back outside to look at the object, i could no longer find it.

the next day i went out at the same time, hoping to see the object again and confirm that it was a natural celestial event.  the three lights did not appear, nor was i able to find the bluish light that seemed to come from its sides.  i was, however, able to locate the nearby star patterns that i had used to note its location in the sky.
content.summary: Black triangle with three lights hovered in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was cooking and i went out in my yard to smoke a sigarette when i noticed lights above my head. my first impression was an airplain flying very low but i had immediately a perfect sight of five triangular yellow lights, in a wing formation. the lights were not bright. each triangle was perfectly visible but the image i would describe it out of focus.
the two latelal lights left the formation and moved towards the center. the right object moved very quicly left, right left, remaining flat. the second one also moved but not as fast. in that moment i thought that somebody was projecting some kind of laser lights into the sky but there were no clouds. when i lost sight of these lights behind a neighbour wall i went inside to take my camera in case they came back. instead,i spotted two more of these lights, not right over my head but more toward the center of the yard, flying at the same speed and altitude but very close to each other. by the time i was ready to take a picture these objects were pretty far and all i have is an image with 2 little lights that could be anything. at least i know that this is what i have seen....
it seems impossible that nobody else have reported this event as the lights were flying low, parallel to i-95 direction south towards center city philadelphia.

thank you.
content.summary: Formation of 5 followed by formation of 2.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my bavkyard hottub on cold cloudless night. as i was looking up to the north (at about 8:15pm) i noticed a faint orange glowing cloud, like the glow from the interstate lights. behind the moving cloud (going south) were black spots/lines forming an arrow pointing south. between the arrow were diagonal black lines crisscrossing between the arrow.  every 5-10 seconds, the diagonal lines turned to scattered black spots, then back to diagonals, etc.  at first i was thinking it looked ike a flock of geese but knew after watching a definite pattern of thecdiagonal lines turning to scattered and back that geese do not have patterns that changed back and forth every few seconds   unless a person was concentrating on the sky as i was, it wouldn't be noticeble.  the cloud of cream/orange moved with the object like camoflauge at what seemed around 20,000 -30,000 feet i'm air. i know it was solid because it blocked out the stars as it moved and thecorange cloud moved exactly with black spots to keep it covered up.   i lost it from sight when it was far enough south to be covered by my tree.  i estimate it took about 3 minutes to cover from north to south and there was no noise.  i knew i did not have time to run into house and get a camera.   i immediately called a friend to describe the object and told her to let me know if she heard any reports on tv.  i've monitored the web and saw a similar report in canada and australia but notin the same time period.  i also reported it on a local site that tracks ufo sightings. how i felt when i saw it was complete confidence that it was nothing i had ever seen before.  i was nervous enough to immediately go inside, lock the doors and monitor the news and internet.  it didn't surprise me that no one else saw it because the camoflauge was so faint in orange color that it almost completely blended into the sky.  i wouldn't have notced if the black spots or lines wouldn't have penetrated through the glow.    i remember we had an ice storm during the morning hours about 8 hours later.  i had my annual eye checkup the next morning and was 20/20 without glasses.
content.summary: Arrow shaped black spots covered with orange glow moving north to south.

content.detailedDescription:
Again i say that this is one of many different sightings that i have witnessed. this is only the second time that i have seen this particular object. at exactly 1:25 am i was out on my deck peering through my telescope. as the motor moved the scopes declination, i noticed something of a blur. i quickly looked up, and to my surprise i saw what appeared to be a light(maybe white), long, cylindrical object moving very slowly at about 20 degrees above horizon. at first glance i thought it might be a missile because the moon was fairly bright and shaded what turned out to be a large portion of the object. as the clouds slightly shrouded the moon and the object turned counterclockwise i noticed that it was quite a bit larger that my previous assumption. it resembled a passenger aircraft with no wings, no tail, no discernible nose and from what i could tell and see in my telescope, no markings whatsoever. this object moved in all directions and pivoted on its axis allowing me to see it very well. there were lights but not like an aircraft. from what i could see, the only lights were on its nose or tail(one end as there was no way to tell which end was nose or tail).  the object moved in such a way that i have never seen before or after. most of the time it looked as if it just was creeping along but every now and then it would move so fast that it appeared to vanish and appear a mile or two across the sky in an instant. this got my attention as i have never seen something move that fast. it continued to creep and sometimes dart for exactly one hour and 22 minutes. i could see that the object was relatively close because i would occasionally loose it behind a group of clouds( i live up on the haleakala crater) and other times i noticed the same clouds behind the object. i would estimate the length at an astounding 700-1000 feet. the method i used to come to that length was, i waited for it to pass between myself and the crater and used some geographical features that i know to be approx. 100 yards in length. the object simply dwarfed the crater feature i mentioned, possibly 3 times as long. after watching it for almost an hour and a half, i thought it went behind some low clouds. it turned out that it did not go behind or into the clouds, it simply disappeared but with what i would call a trace. where i saw it last in the sky, the moon lit up the group of clouds that it went into, and there i noticed a fairly large but perfectly round hole in the cloud mass. i stayed out scanning the sky for another 30 minutes but the object did not return to the best of my knowledge. i had called my good friend and told him to look low on the western horizon about 15 minutes before it dissipated. i had waited to call him simply because his wife is pregnant and it was very late. after about an hour+ of viewing the object came very close to being over his house, it was then i decided to chance the wrath of his wife simply because it was so close to him that i thought he might be able to tell what it was. he ran to his lanai and looked but described the same as me except the size which he said was bigger than my estimate and absolutely no sound whatsoever! i had seen something very much like this about 8 years ago in the skies above malibu canyon road. it was the middle of the day and i was comming back from a surf session with a buddy of mine. we both witnessed it before it disappeared out of sight. i would have to say that given the close resemblance to the object i saw the other night, that this was probably the same type of object. i think that just about covers it....If you could venture a guess as to what i saw i would be open to suggestions.

aloha and ma halo for taking the time to read my account.

gh
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: This is one of many sightings. the object moved low on horizon in circular patterns, often stopping and reversing direction

content.detailedDescription: Myself my co-worker soupi,and my other peer hayden,were just getting off work on that morning and we were walking towards the employee parking lot,we work at inquier daily news in conshocken p.A.,the direction we where walking was torwards what we call around here mid county where all 3 counties meet.And we saw a green flash like nothing none of us had ever seen before.We paused and where amazed for about a minute,and then we dropped it,never talked about it again for fear of being called insane.Well at least thats what i was thinking,until i saw the show on the discovery channel last night i now know i am not insane.Sightings of ufos over bucks county,i do believe now.I also 2 days later had a out of body experience i did not go anywhere as far as i can remember  i fell asleep on my couch and was out of my body in my living room looking down at myself sleeping.And that never happened again.I to also have nothing to gain out of this ,i get to express what happened without being called crazy.But this object was so fast i am assuming it was round and the green trail behind it was just as fast,and it was low heading south west about five ten am i always wear a watch.,it is a good feeling inside to be able to express this to someone who can relate that show last night has put my mind at ease.Thank you for generating that show. cd.
content.summary: Walking to car and saw it.

content.detailedDescription: On a clear afternoon about 3 pm, i was walking in our back yard and looked up to see a triangular shaped object. it never made a sound. my guess is that it was perhaps flying at 7000 feet up in the sky. the sky was fairly clear with scattered clouds at the south towards san diego. the object was not a hard triangle, but rather the edges were smooth. i saw no outstanding features on it. the color was a "dull shiny gray".. not high gloss, but more of a sheen rather than a shine. perhaps satin-like in appearance. i only ever saw the underneath and it appeared to bulge slightly at the center.. not straight and smooth, but a slight inflated appearance towards the center. it was almost directly above me and flew very slowly and silently directly towards the south and then made a right angle into a cloud and disappeared several miles south... maybe 15 miles down. my mom was with me during the first few minutes, then went into the house to get a pair of binoculars. she returned about 5 minutes later, but by that time, it had disappeared. it was in the sky for about 10 minutes or so. it never turned around or made any sudden movements. it traveled slowly and smoothly. i made an illustration to show you appoximately what it looked like.
content.summary: Triangular-shaped ufo over escondido, california - 2000

content.detailedDescription:
My wife & i had been experimenting w/bdsm sex activity w/intense humiliation factor, her dominant adminstering pain & cruelty, at my prompting as submissive. i taped these bizzare perverted sessions using a fullsize 1991 panasonic vhs camcorder w/new premium tape, set up to cover half the living room apartment. these sessions lasted apx 30-90 min, the tape ran nonstop, a clip on light was on camcorder. at end of session i would carefully reveiw the tape to see how it came out; and there were a few times i noticed the apperance of a swirl of colored sparkles, first none, then size of a walnut, than spread to footbal size swirl of color lights. 

once i realized fully what i had encountered, by definition alone, i was quite spooked. oddly my wife & i are both christians, albiet pathetic ones. i immed perceived an intelligence watching us commit these total acts of degradation and debaquchery. we divorced ten years ago, i had been obsessed w/this bizzare sex and something had possessed me and deriven me deeper and deeper even when i no longer wanted any more; i beegan to go insane via sexual perversion and demonic panic attacks. at bedtime was worst by far.

i viewed these couple minutes of apparitions a hundred times & ways & try as did, i saw them appear out of nowhere via frame advance, one frame at a time, also via variable speed slow motion. they were a cluster of individual spirit beings each having concious awareness & ability to travelpoint to point through dwellings and space w/o corporeal bodies.

music playing loudly was madonna like a prayer album (very demonic filth)
also, my wife was victim of extensive sexual molestation & lived w/satanic priest.

to my amazement similar drifting colorful light orbs; first drift down slow and smooth at fixed angle, others follow same angle but different places, after this intial viscous damped down angle movement, they each beco free at an equilent point of travel from start: thenmons arede they give swirl as they vanish-sort of.
egaradless i saw same exact phenpomenon on amsterdam sado masochism w/women wearing strap on rubber dildo forcing it on man who had been feminized.

these sparkles are infact malicious demonic spirits, ie fallen angels,
i taped them several times indoors, perhaps they were careless, or very brazen in their hold upon me 13 years ago.

these are the same beings that people see in the sky and foolishly attribute them to space vehicles...Ufo's yes, vehicles no! spirit beings
are ufo's.
content.summary: Appeared on vhs tape rec of perverse sex acts-upper left corner frame football sized & shaped cluster colored sparkles hoverede & some began flowing as viscous fluid down diagnal conduit apx 2-3ft, then each indepen &vanished, lasted 3 min.

content.detailedDescription:
from the front porch of my residence myself and my grandsons observed:
at approximately 7:30 pm (cst)myself and my three grandsons, two are 11 
and my oldest is 14, were watching a bright star that was southwestern horizon.  as we all watched the star became dimmer and dimmer until it vanished from sight.  approximately five minutes later, it re-appeared.
looking through binoculars i was able to discern, that instead of one source of light for that star, there in fact three white orbs in a horizontal configuration. one of my grandsons observed three white orbs move in a northerly position and two went up "very fast" while the other went downward also very fast. my grandsons were extremely excited and very curious as to what they had all just witnessed.
content.summary: Three separate orbs came from this ufo, slightly north then went vertical at a very high speed.

content.detailedDescription: It was about 6pm the light just appeared directly over house out of no where. we was sitting around a fire in the backyard. it was just sitting there for a few seconds then headed north.  it wasnt very high in  the sky and just glowed very brightly. as it was  getting close to the tree line it was approached by a plane at about an 11:00 angle. then light the rapidly dimmed and was out of sight just as the planed approached it.  about 20 mins later it reappeared over the house very high up  this time it was following a plane headed south when it got too close to the plane it dimmed.  we have a video of this.  about 15 mins later the light then was sighted very very high up  coming from the west but headed north on the same path as the first time it was sighted. about 20 mins later it was spotted again headed south  the same very very high up as the last time viewed. each time it was witnessed  it was directly over the backyard.
content.summary: Bright starlike objects.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was on my back porch, looking up at the stars, and i saw a very bright ball move across the sky very slowly, and it died out, like a light bulb.  it didn't take off, there was no fast movement, it just wasn't there anymore.  they do have a cloaking device, invisible capability.  that to me is no longer a theory, it's reality.  they can be invisible, they make no sound, they could be anywhere, anytime.  

sorry, no photo.  it happened so fast.
content.summary: Bright slow moving star disappeared.  not a take off.  they could be invisible

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving from ithaca ny to go (7-8mil drive) to trumansburg ny(countryside) where we were residing at that time.It was between 17:10pm and 17:20pm max. i know that because my father was getting out of work at 17:00pm and we were going home together. the sun was close to setting and it was reflecting back a bit. as i was driving out of the city something caught my eye as it was reflecting in the sun (left side of driver). i have seen this round disc shaped silver/platinum object flying  left side of my car. i was probably going about 50mil a hour. the object was very low to the ground probably about 100m at the most or lower then that pretty dissent size about at least 2 times as a mazda mx6 in length . it moved from the side of my car(left) to almost over me. it was heavy traffic and lots of people have seen it. as it went over the car i pointed out to my father the object and he seen it too.. this silver/platinum disc had small lights surrounding the disc, running around it in a circular motion one by one. on top of the disc there was a half circle transparent in color/glass or something and there were 3 big lights spinning in it. underneath the disc in the center there was an inward circle like a submarine door, and the outside circle was surrounded with lights running in a circular motion they were white light. after it has passed over my car it started to speed up going to the left over some trees and with in 2 seconds was gone in to the sunset. i have never seen a ufo in my life neither has my father seen one till that day. we were very excited of what we have seen! we told our family about it too they were suspicious about things of that nature. 

that  same night i have seen it again! i was doing some homework and i was up late close to 12am. my bedroom was upstairs and my window was facing east. that night was a clear night except a white lost cloud in the sky in front of my window, as i turned off the light to get in bed, i looked out the window because my bed was right next to it and i have seen the cloud flashing in colors, yellow, red, and green (jumping light) through the cloud as they were spinning at fast rate. colors i have never seen in my life! they were so intense the closest thing i could describe to you it would have to be a rainbow. it was the same disc going towards cayuga lake direction. i went out of the house   to see if i can see it again. in few minutes  i have seen it again coming from the same direction as the first time going towards the lake again. it was flying at extreme speeds, i never seen anything fly that fast i know it was something the air force doesnt have. it was flying very fast and it made a 90 degree turn without even slowing down and disappeared. it was gone in less then 5 second out of the night sky and that was the last time i have seen it. i told some of my friends about it and they have seen similar things at different times in other close areas (dryden ny). upstate ny lots of people encountered flying discs has something to do with the cayuga lake. 

2 years later after the first incident, i was in the same room  sleeping (my bed was close to the wall and window).I woke up to a humming sound, the closest i can describe it, would have to be  some kind of ventilator or vacuum. i was very tired that night and i thought that the noise it will go away whatever it is, it might be on the street (trumansburg rd). that noise it was going on for some time through out the night probably at least 30 min or so. i was waken up, i was going in and out of my sleep.  as i mentioned my room was on the second floor, and my window was facing e. the only light that could have enter my room was the sun. as i was sleeping i was facing the wall and a bright light illuminated my room just like you have brought the sun in my room. it was night time no day ! i jumped up and turned around to see what it was but i havent seen anything. the noise was gone and also the light that entered my room. next day i went in the city, it was about 15:00pm. it was a cloudy afternoon but through the clouds something caught my eyes, i could see jumping lights of different colors again, going e very fast and was gone in 2 sec.This incident was at about the same location as 2 years earlier. that was the last time i have seen anything. i thought i share it with you guys. thanks for taking the time to read.
content.summary: It was a circle object silver/platinium color and glass half bowl on top with light inside.

content.detailedDescription: It happend in the summer in the mnth of june, me and my girfriend and her cousin were in terrace heights on a canal road that over looks yakima. we were sitting in the car for about 2 hours talking about the days events and other none speciface topics. at one moment of a conversation i looked up threw my moon roof and noticed a bright light in the sky, at first i thought it was an airplane. i realized that the light had no blinking light like and airplane and was not moving so at that time i asked my girlfriend and her cousin "what is that" and i pointed at the moon roof towerds the object, they tried to look at it threw th moon roof but couldnt see it so my girl friend looked out the passanger window, as she did this the object at that time was the brightist light in the sky went from a bright light in the sky to a small dim star looking light, it started moving north in an upward direction until it vanished into the sky. me and my girl friend looked at each other and i asked her"did u see that"? she replied yes" and i said" what was that"? and we both just stared at each other in disbalief. that was my first sighting of these lights and have abserd many more over yakima since.
content.summary: Bright light that dimmed and flew north and up.

content.detailedDescription:
I had attended a 4-h club meeting at mrs knights house near ebey's landing, near coupeville, wa. i left the house after the meeting and walked down the long drive way to the street to wait for my mother to pick me up, i was about 7 to 8pm. everyone else was gone and i was alone standing by a street light. i think it was in the spring, because as i remember it was dark early and yet it was not vary cold, so i am guessing maybe march or april, the day,not sure. also the night was still, not common for that area near the west beach of whidbey island. as i waited i could hear a low pitched, low volume sound comming from over head. i looked up and could see what i thought was a plane flying over head, planes were common, because there was a naval air station and a sea plane base on the island. what was uncommon was the slow movement of the object, the low noise level,and the low altitude,it seemed to be just about three telephone pole lengths off the ground. i tried to estimate the by looking at the pole the street light was on.  the most important thing i was the structure of the object, the way the surface was assembled. it looked like bolts or rivets connecting plates to an unders structure.  the light by which i could see the details of the structure was not from the street light but moved with the object.  i could not see the size of the object because it was too dark.  i watched it for maybe a minute or two until it was out of sight.  when my mother arrived i told her about it, but she was not imperssed. i did't think too much more about it, until i became friends with an air force pilot, just a few years ago, and told him thinking that he might know what kind of a plane it was. his response was "i have always wanted to see one of those", i ask, those what? he answered a ufo, there arn't planes that can do what you describe. tonight i saw a program about you research so i thought i should tell someone, that would be you. let me know if more dtails would be helpful. thanks, sonny sleater 
p.S. sorry any typos or spelling errors
content.summary: Low flying, slow moving object, very little noise, i could the structure on the surface that i could see.

content.city: In the middle of the dese
content.detailedDescription: I was driving threw new mexico about 11am or so my friend steve walker was driving in front of me about 50 feet i was traveling with a girl tammy lockard as i was traveling threw the desert somthing got my attention out way in the desert i saw a shinney object coming toward my car it first looked like a nother car driving in the desert with the sun reflecting of the car i thought that was kind of strange because we were so far out in the desert i saw no roads on my left then i kept driving not really thinking about the shinney object i saw way out in the desert then about ten minutes later i felt soming tell my mind to look on my left again out in the new mexico desert then i saw the round ball of metal huvering about two or three feet above the ground it was traveling with my car side ways but comming towards my car i told steve on my walkie talkie to look on his left out in the desert to tell me if he see's what i am seeing he was so busy talking to the girl i was traveling with that he looked real quick said i see somthing shinney then went back talking to tammy i told tammy to look on my side of the window she was not to interested she was talking to my friend on the walkie talkie not paying attention i just kept driving not talking to them about the object then i kept driving and looking the round ball the size of a basket ball got closer to my car then i seen the object very clear it followed the side of my car like it was traveling with me huvering it new that i saw it i didn't say any more to my friends i was traveling with i was so stund at what i was seeing i seem to keep it to my self as i kept driving the round metal orb seem to be coming toward my car straight toward my passenger door on my left all of a sudden it was about five feet from my car i seen it real clear it new i saw it i felt it in my mind then i yelled to tammy to look real quick on my left by the time she looked it hit my car between my door and my passenger in the middle i stopped the car real fast then i looked down real quick the orb stopped for a second then went around my car when i looked in my reer view mure i saw it huver over the road back threw the other side of the desert and vanished when i got out of the car to look at the damage still stund at what i saw there was a round dent in the side of my car left from the round metal ball my friend tammy was shook up a little because it hit the car pretty hard she thought it was a rock that hit my car from the side then my friend steve said he saw somthing round hit my car from the desert but he said it was so quick he did'nt get a good look at what it was but i seen it very clear i know what i saw it has been bugging me for years who ever built that metal orb wanted me to see it i don't care if you guys beleave me or not i no what hit my car in the middle of the day in new mexico i feel good telling you guy's because it buges me all the time i feel there watching me all the time every were i go i feel who ever built that orb is still watching me i saw somthing about two years before the orb event i don't know how to exsplain it to you people i saw somthing else i will have to talk to you guy's in person to exsplain it to you guy's this is somthing else i will never forget i know what i saw is related to the metal ball when i watched larry king not to long ago i saw a woman who's father discoverd the crash in rosewald new mexico she was at his death bed when her father broke the secret to his daghter it put shilles in my body when she told larry king what her father saw the being's that nasa took a way for studdey she told larry king that her father saw repitile being type life forms that is what i saw two thats why it put shilles on my skin i felt that the larry king show was ment for me to watch that night i want to thank you guy's for listing to me it feels like a ton has been lifted of my back i know soon we will all see what i saw soon i feel them getting closer to show all of us the magic if you guys know other people that have seen metal orbes please let me know i need to talk to them it is very important to me thank you eric eversole.
content.summary: Round metalic orb hovering above the desert  floor.
content.locationName: In the middle of the dese, New Mexico

content.detailedDescription:
Below is 2 emails describing what i saw many years ago at ft. phantom lake, abilene, texas.

i am aviation aware. a student pilot and know what i see in the air. can usually tell you make and model of the aircraft, etc.  what i saw that night, i can only tell you what it was not!

that was one weird night!  me and a friend thought it would be fun to spend the night at the lake. it was summer and we were out of school.  we went in his car and were laying out on lawn chairs nearby the lake shore.
 
no moon, lots of stars!  we were talking about "wouldn't it be great if we saw a ufo?"  please understand. there was nothing involved to make us "see" anything. no booze, no drugs, etc.  anyway, they tell me, no matter what you have been taking, when both of you see the same thing, then it must be real right?
 
 
anyway, we were laying on our backs looking at the stars.  we saw a star track across the starfield.  that was probably an airliner or maybe a satellite.  hours went by and then, about 11:00pm (23:00hrs) mike said, for the second time, "wouldn't it be cool if we saw a ufo?"
 
at that instant, i looked to my right toward the dam.  we were near the lakeshore and below the top of the dam.  normal camping/fishing/recreation place at the lake.  the top of the dam was maybe 50 feet above us.
 
i said to mike, "you mean like that?"  silence!  we both stared in awe at what we were looking at!  it just came over the lake, not quite even with us.  it did not turn around but kinda hovered then reversed course and went back over the dam.
 
 
well, you can guess what we were talking about!  wow! what the hell was that?
 
about 5 minutes later, we had settled down a bit and i told mike, "it's back!"
 
did i ever tell you about what i saw over lake ft. phantom, near abilene, texas and dyess afb in the mid '70's?
 
i can not tell you what it was. i can tell you what is was not.
 
it was not an airplane, helicopter, hot air balloon, weather balloon, blimp, zeppelin, autogyro, etc., etc. i think you get the idea.
 
nothing flies that slow, makes no sound and maneuvers!
 
it came in low over the dam, approx 150-200 ft agl.  approx the size of a car.  maybe 20ft long, oval shaped and translucent!  no definite shape. like it was lit from within.  like it was a plastic ball with a light source inside.  it was a dull red color.  came over the dam, reversed course 180 and left the way it came.
 
about 5 minutes later, it was back.  it tracked parallel to us then made a right angle turn directly toward us. came within maybe 300 feet horizontally then made another right angle turn away from us then began to change colors!  i do not mean any marker lights changed. there were no marker lights. the entire craft changed colors, rapidly!  from red to white to green.  i could not tell any apparent time or color sequence!  craft then returned to dull red, made a slight angle jog in course and we eventually lost it directly over the power plant at the other end of lake ft. phantom!  total time of observation, approx. 20 minutes!  max speed of craft, maybe 20 mph.  normal speed, approx. 5 mph
 
in the mid '70's there were no remote control craft like you might see today.  the only thing that could move that slow was a balloon of sorts or a helicopter.  a balloon could not make those maneuvers!  a helicopter can not make no noise!
 
again, i do not know what i saw. i only know what it was not!
 
i know i am not crazy.  there was someone else with me who saw the same thing!


 as i said, it was in view for a long time!  i do remember trying mike's cb radio in his car and it worked.  no one, of course believed me, but the electrical circuits and radio freqs did work, unlike many other ufo reports.
 
this thing did, however, one thing many other ufo have done.  it went out of sight directly over the power plant!  i don't know what it is about power plants and ufo's but they seem to go hand in hand.
 
never moved fast nor changed altitude. moved in only 2 dimensions.
did not look like anything i have seen in the air before or since.
content.summary: Slow speed, silent, changed colors made right angle turns.  was in sight for 20 minutes

content.detailedDescription: Was setting around with my best friend, singing songs and just hanging out.  i was 14 and he was 16 at the time.  we were just sitting around bsing at the time, and at exactly at the same time we noticed a bright white round light above us.  it hovered a minute as if it noticed us seeing it, and then it shot up and away at an alarming rate of speed.  what caught my attention was it was not initially moving when we spotted it.
content.summary: A white hovering light that lingered until it was spotted.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello,

i have seen unusual phenomena in central al area. i have had multiple sightings of light that appear to be stars but they are moving in very strange 
zigzag motions. they appear to be descending and then shooting up very fast. they are not stars and i have never seen anything like this before.
is their any local location or authorities i can report to?

i also have video of these events. this has occurred multiple nights in the last week. i am also seeing it tonight.

this was a long night of watching the sky. i first noticed what a nice night it was and how clear the sky appeared. then a light appeared to be moving and that is when i first noticed the object. it appeared to maintain still for moments at a time and then appeared ascending and desending rapidly. i came in got a camcorder and begain shooting the sky,
the first night i had issues getting a good shot with the camera but the next night i could see it much better. 

thanks
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Unusual sight.

content.detailedDescription:
To whom it may concern ,
my name robert j white of muskegon on sept  25 , 2008, i decided to take some photos of the stars messing around with my cousins. so i went outside and started taking photos of the stars. as i looked threw my camera i really didn't see anything at all., so after taking nine photos i headed in. but when i got in the house to view the photos. i found them too not only have stars on them, but also it held photos of quite abit of circle discs. if my eyes is not failing me it must be about (12) disc shaped objects or more, my camera is a fujifilm fine pix digital 2600zoom 3x optical zoom 2.0 mega pixel. so i decided to go out every chance i get, i went out the sept 25, 26, and 27 , of  2008. all togehter i took 35 photos and 12 of them have something on them. i don't want to stick my chip in this computer and lose the photos by error. however, if you send the directions to and how to down load the imformation to you , i will do that as well. my email address is alvera.Atkinson@yahoo.Com, you could send your response robert of  muskegon county. 
the photos was taking outside of my home in the back yard of muskegon mi,and yes i felt petty weird i showed everyone i could.I also have more photos and film of something undescribe-able in the skies of muskegon michigan.So these first photos was the beginning of a line of photos and film.
      p.S thank you for giving me the opportunity to share what i saw the night of sept 25,26,and 27 2008. robert of muskegon
content.summary: It was just a unbelieveable event and it lasted for acouple of days so it was exciting.

content.detailedDescription: On november 17, 2008 at approximately 2200hrs, i was walking home from my drive way which is approximately 15 yards from my house when i notice a silent flashing object on the horizon due south-east from my location, upon further observation, i notice it was a stationary sphere flashing in a green and blue multi-colored, at first i thought it was a border patrol helicopter or a uav which they a common in my area due to the proximity to the mexican border, the object did not appeared to be any conventional aircraft,  i thought that was awkward, and kept observing the object for a couple of minutes possibly two to three minutes when, i notice a smaller white light it either came out or fall off the object, i lost track of the smaller object because at that point i could not believe my eyes, i was mesmerize by the event i had just witness, i then notice the stationary green and blue sphere move up in an unexplained manner and disappear.  the whole event only lasted no more than ten minutes, i wish i would off taken some video or pictures, i thought about it, but my camera did not have a charge batteries and video camera was at my brothers house, i tried my cell phone camera but it was useless.  i know that with out pictures or video is hard to back up my case, i was by myself and i do not know of any other witness.  the weather that night was beautiful, with a real clear sky, and most of the stars were visible.  i have no reason to make this up, i am a current federal government employee that works at a local airport, i work day in and day out with airplanes, and i know how airplanes sound, how they look at night and at a distance etc., prior to my current employment i was employed at a local police department, and i am a amateur astronomer so i am familiar with the night sky.  and my residence is located outside city limits in the ranch country so i have a very clear view of the night sky.
content.summary: A stationary flashing blue and green sphere, some came out of the flying object.

content.detailedDescription:
On october 8, 2008 i was flying to oakland, ca from chicago, il. about half way into the flight, or a little more, i was bored and just started staring out the window as we were flying over the mountain states. i soon realized a black egg flying around the same height as the plane was. it had a ghostly black tail (my first thought was that it was a plane on fire!) and was smoothly flying near the plane, as if it was supposed to be there.

curious, i started taking pictures of it, so i could later zoom in and see it clearer. i remember looking around and not seeing anyone else notice it...And i didn't say anything to anyone. i remember thinking "if this is a dangerous object...The pilot would know, right?"

then i took a video of the egg as it changed directions to be perpendicular to the plane. any suspicions of falling asteroids were immediately dismissed...As they can't change directions...Or fly.

it seemed like the tail got bigger and bigger as the egg flew away from us. i tried to convince myself that it was some militaristic plane, as we were over one of the mountain states where they could do testings.

but it didn't seem right...I really think that what i saw was unexplainable.
content.summary: Black egg with ghostly tail.
